entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Flagler and southeastern Putnam Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1211 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Pomona Park and also over northwest portions of Flagler county, moving southeast at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall.
